title: The Destruction of Sodom
summary: Genesis 19 recounts the destruction of Sodom and Gomorrah due to their wickedness. Angels rescue Lot and his family, but his wife looks back and becomes a pillar of salt. Lot and his daughters later live in a cave, where troubling events unfold.

faq.question: Why were Sodom and Gomorrah destroyed?
faq.answer: Because of their extreme wickedness and unrepentant sin.

faq.answer: She looked back at the city and was turned into a pillar of salt.
